sellerCard.oneLiner: Your Satisfication is My First Priority
sellerCard.description:
WordPress Development✅, Web Design✅, Responsive Design✅, SEO Optimization✅I specialize in transforming ideas into digital reality. I focus on making websites that capture your vision and help you achieve your business goals.

I take pride in my meticulous approach to web design, ensuring each website is not just aesthetically pleasing, but also offers seamless functionality. My commitment to excellence is demonstrated through high client satisfaction and repeat business.

description.content:
Are you looking for a professional to design or redesign your WordPress website? I specialize in creating visually stunning, user-friendly, and fully responsive WordPress websites tailored to your business needs. Whether you're starting from scratch or revamping an existing site, Ill ensure your website not only looks great but also drives traffic, engages visitors, and delivers real results.



What I Offer

  • Mobile-Friendly Design
  • Custom WordPress Development
  • Elementor Pro Builder Integration
  • Premium Themes & Plugins
  • Website Redesign & Cloning
  • WooCommerce E-Commerce Solutions
  • Payment Gateway Setup
  • On-Page SEO Optimization
  • Speed Optimization
  • Social Media Integration
  • Regular Backups & Maintenance
  • Free Logo Design (Premium Package)



Why Choose Me?

  • 100% Client Satisfaction Focus
  • Unlimited Revisions
  • Timely Project Delivery
  • Fully Editable Websites
  • Money-Back Guarantee
  • FREE VIP Support for Repeat Buyers



Please don't hesitate to contact me to discuss your project before placing an order. I look forward to working with you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don't have text and images. Can you help me to get images and text for my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If the client doesn't have any text and images, I write some placeholder texts and I can use license-free photos, videos, and graphics. But Fiverr has the option to purchase high-quality stock images through Shutterstock.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why should I choose you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can build a fully working professional website. And unlimited revisions until you are not satisfied with the final product.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support after the website is done?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: YES of course, I provide support for only two weeks after the website is done, if you want a longer period of support like for months/Year, get in touch with me and I will share my maintenance packages for that purpose.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide domain & hosting in your packages?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, but I will suggest the best hosting provider. You can get the hosting and domain from here. The best ever hosting provider. My No. 1 recommendation: bit.ly/2Q0xYrX They give: Free domain name Free daily backups Free SSL Free Cloud flare and much much more

reviews.comment: I misunderstood the scope of the work that I needed, and as a result so did my freelancer.  He went above and beyond to work with us to finish it as best we could - I even offered to pay him and finalize the project early when we realized I had given him incorrect instructions, but he continued to work on the project anyhow and did all of the things that were within his knowledge base plus researched alternative solutions to get us most of the way there.  I believe if we had hired this freelancer to create a brand new WordPress site the project would have been perfect as he was a great communicator and very professional and proactive.  I will work with him again and I would recommend him!

seller_response.comment: Many thanks, you're a great buyer ❤️

reviews.comment: Sidr worked closely with me on this project. I found him not only polite but very professional, friendly and happy to accommodate my requests, ideas and change of mind. This was a difficult project but he handled and delivered to a very high standard
Seller went above and beyond and delivered what was asked. I would def use again and highly recommend!
Great work. Very active communicator and polite. Highly recommended.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for choosing me for your website.

reviews.comment:
Excellent Service and Quality
I had an amazing experience
